channel.title: CVE Feed for Brocade Communications Systems, Inc. -- Zone Director Controller Firmware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brocade Communications Systems, Inc. -- Zone Director Controller Firmware

item.title: CVE-2017-6223|2024-09-16T21:04:13.663Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- zone%20director%20controller%20firmware
item.description: Ruckus Wireless Zone Director Controller firmware releases ZD9.9.x, ZD9.10.x, ZD9.13.0.x less than 9.13.0.0.232 contain OS Command Injection vulnerabilities in the ping functionality that could allow local authenticated users to execute arbitrary privileged commands on the underlying operating system.
